## Deal Finder

Personal shopping advisor with price tracking and Perplexity research.
Region, retailers, and currency are configurable in the Config node.

**Requirement Commands:**
- `/deals` - Get recommendations for all active categories
- `/deals phone` - Get recommendations for specific category
- `/deals add phone 800CHF flagship camera` - Add requirement
- `/deals remove phone` - Remove requirement
- `/deals pause phone` - Pause requirement
- `/deals resume phone` - Resume requirement

**Tracking Commands:**
- `/deals track <url>` - Track a product's price
- `/deals tracked` - List all tracked items
- `/deals untrack <name>` - Stop tracking an item
- `check_prices` - Internal: run price checker

**Config (with defaults):**
- `region`: Switzerland
- `retailers`: Digitec, Galaxus, Toppreise, etc.
- `currency`: CHF

Callers can override via Execute Workflow input.

### Google Sheet Schemas

**Requirements tab:**
| Column | Example |
|--------|--------|
| category | Phone |
| constraints | flagship, good camera |
| max_price | 800 CHF |
| priority | high / medium / low |
| status | active / paused |

**Tracked Prices tab:**
| Column | Example |
|--------|--------|
| url | https://digitec.ch/... |
| product_name | Raspberry Pi 5 8GB |
| domain | digitec.ch |
| current_price | 89.90 |
| currency | CHF |
| previous_price | 95.00 |
| lowest_price | 85.00 |
| highest_price | 99.00 |
| first_tracked | 2026-02-08 |
| last_checked | 2026-02-10 |
| status | active / paused |
| notify_mode | always / on_change / threshold |
| price_threshold | 80.00 |
